thread.title: Patrick Bet-David's 7 Signs of Successful People
thread.title_full: Patrick Bet-David's 7 Signs of Successful People

author: Patrick Bet-David
title: Patrick Bet-David's 7 Signs of Successful People
text:
Patrick Bet-David's 7 Signs of Successful People What to look for when selecting team members that will push your business forward. --- Shares February 21, 2017 
Michael Jordan, Alexander the Great and Mohammad Reza Shah. Arnold Schwarzenegger, Derek Jeter and Steve Jobs. The most successful people in the world, whatever their field, all share similar qualities. By reverse engineering those qualities, you can often find out who is going to end up being a good hire and who won't be. They might never turn into Alexander the Great, but if they can be great at what they do, then that's all that matters. 
In this video, Entrepreneur partner Patrick Bet-David explains how to identify whether a potential team member has the qualities you need for your business. 
To learn more, click play. 
Related: Patrick Bet-David on the Biggest Mistake Marketers Make

EN is partnered with hundreds of top YouTube channels in the business vertical and provides partners with distribution on Entrepreneur.com as well as our apps on Amazon Fire , Roku and Apple TV . Patrick Bet-David Patrick Bet-David teaches the fundamentals of entrepreneurship and personal development while inspiring people to break from limiting beliefs or other constraints and achieve their dreams.
